data.name: Maze Qore Arena
data.detailed_description:
WHAT IS MAZE QORE ARENA?



Maze Qore Arena is a top-down, bullet hell, old-school, arena-arcade shooter bundled with 36 singleplayer levels of bullet-raining hell, organized into 6 sectors of the entire prison facility. It also comes with 9 multiplayer game modes, the old-school classics with a unique, crude, twist.

You will not survive alone. You'll need backup.




YOU ARE THE BOSS



You have originally served as a soldier for The Empire, until the Force Commander ordered your division to slaughter an entire village full of unarmed civilians. You defected from your unit, and instead join the local resistance to help the civilians evacuate the village. Even with the help of the village’s militia, your attempts to defend and evacuate the village failed. All of the inhabitants in the village are all dead; the evacuated are MIA. For disobeying orders, you have been court-martialed and convicted of treason and was sentenced to life in the Maze Qore maximum security prison. 12 years have passed since your sentence and your division’s Force Commander has already become the new Fuhrer. One fateful day, a prison riot occurs. The guards are panicking, desperately trying to contain the riots. Doors suddenly open, bullets flying. Bodies piling. The time has come. To make your escape.




CURRENT FEATURES


  • 8-hour Singleplayer Campaign
  • 36 campaign missions
  • Extras and unlockables




EARLY ACCESS



This game is currently in early-access so not all features are completed. We plan to have a fully-functional multiplayer experience that will definitely live up to the game's title "Arena", complete with achievements and our own custom level editor. By supporting us, we can make such goal possible in a much faster time-span.

data.short_description: Maze Qore Arena is a top-down, bullet hell, arena-arcade shooter bundled with 36 levels of bullet-raining hell, organized into 6 sectors of the entire prison facility. You will not survive alone. You'll need backup.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core 32-bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
